ValidationRule.description: Product Type cannot be changed after Case is created. RO-1759
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Customer Operations Manager", $Profile.Name <> "Head of Customer Operations", ISCHANGED( Product_Type__c ) , NOT(ISNEW()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Product Type after the Case has been created.
